abstract: Are you worth $85,000 on the job market? $500,000? A new Web site -- "What Is My Value?" -- allows finance workers to find their personal price tag.
snippet: Are you worth $85,000 on the job market? $500,000? A new Web site -- "What Is My Value?" -- allows finance workers to find their personal price tag.
lead_paragraph: It has been argued in certain circles that Wall Street is worthless. Unproductive. Devoid of social value.

headline.main: What Is a Banker Worth? Here Is One Answer
